admin_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the admin user

root_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the root user

root_ssh_rsa.description: private SSH rsa key for root user

root_ssh_rsa_pub.description: public SSH rsa key for root user (mostly not required)

root_known_hosts.description: known_hosts file information for root user

mail_smarthost.description: autoresponder only: hostname of remote smtp server

mail_auth_user.description: autoresponder only: smtp username if authentication is required

ssh_host_rsa_key.description: private SSH rsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_rsa_key.pub.description: public SSH rsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_dsa_key.description: private SSH dsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_dsa_key.pub.description: public SSH dsa key for the host daemon

munin_master_allow.description: ip addresses (alternative hostname) of the munin master node

nagios_allow.description: ip addresses of the nagios server node, seperated by comma

logstash_redis.description: ip addresses of the logstash redis nodes, seperated by comma and including redis-protocoll

mail_ssl.description: ssl certificate for postfix and dovecot

postfix_mysqluser.description: mysql user for postfix and dovecot

postfix_mysqlpassword.description: mysql password for postfix and dovecot

postfix_mysqldbname.description: mysql database for postfix and dovecot

postfix_tls_only.description: default: false, set to true on enable

vmail_cleanup.description: default: false, set to true on enable
